member.name: IDXGIDebug.ReportLiveObjects

summary.para: Reports info about the lifetime of an object or objects.

member.param: The globally unique identifier (GUID) of the object or objects to get info about. Use one of the DXGI_DEBUG_ID GUIDs.
A -typed value that specifies the amount of info to report.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; an error code otherwise. For a list of error codes, see DXGI_ERROR.

member.name: IDXGIDebug
member.summary: This interface controls debug settings, and can only be used if the debug layer is turned on.
